trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There were no other sightings in Santa Cruz on or around September 6th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on the cliff on West Cliff Dr. next to my taxi, over looking the Monterey Bay when a dark airborne craft flew from over the bay to the unincorperated area of Live Oak near the Radio Towers of KSCO at 24th Ave. I was observing from a mile away in clear sky. The event lasted two or more seconds. As the craft neared the shore, the city lights reflected off the leading edge of the disc object, or the craft blinked it's front lights over one fourth of it's circumference. It was moving at 2-3 hundred Mi.per hour, at a steady altitude of 800 feet. It then went stealth and disappeared.
Summary: No lights, dark until city lights reflected off leading edge. 100-150 ft. in diameter. Thicker in the middle than edges. Disk shape.
